meanings.definition: A group of poets who advocated the use of precise imagery and clear, sharp language in their work.
meanings.sent1: The imagists focused on creating vivid pictures with their words.
meanings.sent2: Many famous poets were part of the imagists.
meanings.sent3: The imagists made sure their poems were as clear as a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: Her poetry was like a painting, thanks to her imagist style.
meanings.sent5: The imagists painted with words, bringing their poems to life.

meanings.definition: A member of the group of poets known as the imagists.
meanings.sent1: As an imagist, she followed the principles of precise imagery.
meanings.sent2: He was proud to be recognized as an imagist poet.
meanings.sent3: The imagist walked around with a notebook, capturing moments in words.
meanings.sent4: In the world of poetry, he stood out as a shining imagist star.
meanings.sent5: Being an imagist meant seeing the world through a unique lens.
